hero.subtitle: Web Developer
hero.text: Front-end developer with extensive experience in creating engaging and functional user interfaces using technologies such as PUG, SCSS, JavaScript, and GULP. Proficient in React, enabling the development of dynamic and efficient applications that achieve a seamless integration of design and functionality. Creating intuitive and visually appealing solutions that enhance the user experience.

description.title: About me
description.text1: Full-Stack Developer with experience in designing scalable and efficient architectures, from microservices to high-performance APIs. Specialized in optimizing Core Web Vitals, integrating CI/CD, and working in agile development environments. Skilled in modern technologies such as React (Vite), Node.js/Express, Prisma, and PostgreSQL, applied in SPA and SSR projects, delivering end-to-end solutions from prototype to production; additionally, experienced in cloud deployments that ensure sustainable and adaptable systems capable of handling any load.
description.text2: Discover how every detail is designed to make a difference.

experience.title: Experience
experience.text1: Comprehensive development of the corporate website for Garcinstal, including the creation of an interactive prototype in Adobe XD to guide the process. Implemented with Gulp, Pug, SCSS, and JavaScript, along with a distinctive logo that reinforced the brand’s visual identity. The result was a functional, responsive site aligned with the company’s values.
experience.text2: Design and development of the website for Giriga Comida Fusión, with a visual approach to highlight its fusion cuisine concept. Built with Gulp, Pug, SCSS, and JavaScript, the platform combines an attractive design with smooth functionality, enhancing the brand’s identity and delivering an immersive user experience.
experience.text3: Development of the corporate website for Kreisel Events, focused on presenting events and services. Conversion of design prototypes into a responsive website, implemented with Pug, SCSS, JavaScript, and layout tools. Navigation was optimized and compatibility across different devices was ensured, improving the company’s digital presence.
experience.text4: Fullstack application for publishing and managing job offers and demands in the livestock sector of the Pyrenees. Developed with React (Vite) on the frontend and Node.js/Express + Prisma/Postgres on the backend, it integrates data validation, multilingual support, administrative email notifications, and an AdminJS management panel. Includes interactive map visualization and advanced filters, deployed on Railway to ensure an agile and scalable environment.
experience.text5: Dynamics 365 developer in Finance & Operations projects, contributing to modeling and extensions with X++ (tables, views, forms, classes, and validations). Development of interfaces with Power Apps (Canvas) connected to Dataverse and automation of business processes using Power Automate, ensuring data integrity and operational efficiency.

frontend.kreiselEvents: Development of a website for a vibrant events company in Barcelona. Using Gulp, Pug, Sass, and JavaScript, a dynamic platform was created, featuring an image carousel, an interactive form, and a responsive design, offering an attractive and functional visual experience.
frontend.garcinstal: Development of a website for a multi-service housing company in London. Implemented with Gulp, Pug, Sass, and JavaScript, the site includes features such as language change and fullscreen mode. A prototype in Adobe XD was created to ensure a consistent and professional visual experience.
frontend.giriga: Development of a website for a fusion food restaurant in Barcelona, using Gulp, Pug, Sass, and JavaScript. The site includes a dark/light theme switch, providing an adaptable and modern visual experience. Although the restaurant is currently closed, the design reflects its innovative and sophisticated essence.
frontend.riseHorizon: Development of a website for Rise Horizon, implemented with Gulp, Pug, Sass, and JavaScript. The site includes features such as an image carousel and theme switching, offering an innovative and highly interactive user experience.
frontend.portfolioDesigner: Development of an interactive portfolio for a designer, built with Gulp, Pug, Sass, and JavaScript. The site showcases featured projects with visual effects and a fully responsive design, delivering a functional and aesthetically appealing experience. It includes immersive animations and a custom language-switching system for intuitive and engaging navigation.
frontend.portfolioDeveloper: Development of an interactive personal portfolio with React JS, designed to showcase skills and achievements in a modern and accessible way. It features a dynamic project gallery, smooth animations using SwiperJS and ScrollReveal, and a custom language-switching system, delivering a visually striking and adaptable experience.
frontend.ascend: Development of an interactive and responsive website implemented with React JS. The design features animated images using the Gsap JS library, as well as animated petals based on the Sakura JS library, specifically adapted for React. Fully compatible with all mobile devices, offering an elegant, visually appealing, and user-friendly interface.

backend.beep: Development of a fullstack web application for publishing and managing job offers and demands in the livestock sector of the Pyrenees. Built with React (Vite) on the frontend and Node.js/Express with Prisma/PostgreSQL on the backend, it integrates data validation, multilingual support, and administrative email notifications. Includes an AdminJS panel for managing dynamic content and static texts. The platform provides advanced search, location-based filters, and interactive map visualization, deployed on Railway to ensure a fast, secure, and scalable environment.
backend.flaskFinance: Web application developed with Flask, SQLAlchemy, and PostgreSQL that allows users to manage their stock portfolio in a secure and intuitive way. It includes user registration and authentication, simulated stock buying and selling with funds validation, portfolio visualization with real-time quotes, and a complete transaction history. Full-stack project with external API integration and relational database management.
backend.birthdays: Development of a web application for storing and managing birthdays, implemented with Flask and an SQLite database. The application enables users to add, view, and delete birthdays through an intuitive form interface.
backend.ajaxRequest: Development of a web application for managing a list of superheroes using a MySQL database and PHP. The database can be created and imported via phpMyAdmin, allowing for efficient management of superhero data.
backend.trivia: Development of a simple trivia application using only HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The application allows users to answer questions and view their scores, providing an interactive and entertaining trivia experience.
backend.movieFinder: Development of a web application to search for movies using 'The Open Movie Database' (OMDb API). Users can search for movies by title, filter by release year, and sort the results, providing an efficient and personalized search experience.
